de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.base.metric
Interface Metric

All Known Implementing Classes:
AirMetric, AssoMetric, DirectMatrixMetric, EucledianMetric, InternalOptMetric, MapMetric, MatrixMetric
public interface Metric

A metric gives access to information about distances and travel times between locations. This interface specifies the necessary methods for all inherited metrics.

Author:
hschneid
